snippet: The designer says her new shop in London, which is filled with art installations and flower motifs, is a brick-and-mortar embodiment of her identity.
abstract: Fashion designer Simone Rocha opens first store in London; Queen Anne-styled space contains many unique touches.
lead_paragraph: The designer says her new shop in London, which is filled with art installations and flower motifs, is a brick-and-mortar embodiment of her identity.

headline.main: Simone Rocha on Her (Very Personal) First Store

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design
